website_summaries.verdict: The Ryka Hydrosphere received wide acclaim from the people who used it for water aerobics and similar activities. It was praised for its support, traction, and ability to drain water. Overall, it was deemed an efficient water fitness shoe.
pros: A vast majority of users found the Ryka Hydrosphere to be excellent for water aerobics
Many wearers appreciated the fit and support that the trainer offered
The absence of laces and the slip-on construction of the footwear made it easy to put on and take off for a number of buyers
Most purchasers favored the stylish look of the product
The drainage ports in the sole unit were effective in removing water from the shoe interiors, according to some reviewers
The traction of the outsole on wet surfaces and pool floors was also lauded by several people
cons: People with narrower foot dimensions found the trainer a bit loose

customer_reviews.title: These run large.. order size down
customer_reviews.text: I love RYKAs and use them when I teach both aquatic and land exercise. I am a consistent women's size 8 with Rykas. I am not sure if it is because these are lace-free, but I had to return my size 8s for a size 7 ( which fit great). They offer some arch support but are not as cushioned as the Ryka Hydro Sport shoes. I will still use Hydro Sports when I have to teach aquatics on deck, but in the water, I will use these Hydrospheres. Don't get me wrong, the Hydrosphere worked well when I taught my classes on the deck, but I would have preferred a little more cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect support for water exercises
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have had a Ryka for 16 years, and it is still performing well; I just thought it is time to get a new pair. I read the reviews and knew that it runs somewhat big. I normally wear size 9 or 9.5 shoes, depending on the style, so based on reviews I ordered a size 9 and it fits like a glove. I have already used it for water aerobics and am really happy with it. It is easy to put on and take off, and provides perfect support for the feet jumping up and down in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Farzy

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good, unless you have wide feet
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good, unless you have wide feet. Luckily, I only wear them for an hour during my water aerobics class. I could have ordered a mens water shoe, but I get tired of not having awesome colored shoes. If your foot is only a little wide, they will be fine. If they are extra, extra wide, I suggest the ones you have to tie.
customer_reviews.author: Best Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, order a smaller size.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, but I had to return and get a half size smaller. Might even have been able to go a whole size smaller. After getting the smaller shoe, I love it for water aerobics.
customer_reviews.author: kr

customer_reviews.title: Great color, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I needed hot pink / magenta shoes, comfortable for walking, and saw someone wearing these on a tour. I was surprised that they were water shoes, but that’s ok. They fit me fine and are reasonably comfortable. Looking forward to wearing them this summer!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fit, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These fit very well and are a good price. The arch support is very good and this makes it easy for me to walk in the pool area and do my exercises in the pool. I needed a fit that had plenty of toe room with snug heels. This shoe fits very well. It's also the kind worn by female Olympians. Still wearing well after two years. Great for aqua aerobics when you require custom orthotics for an uneven gait.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. The Pink is beautiful. Omg. So comfortable and light weight for water aerobics. I wear a size 8 but purchased a size 7. I did this because of another REVIEW.
customer_reviews.author: Jin60

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes I have ordered from Ryka before but ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed I have bought two pairs of shoes for my mom and myself and they are not cheap the shoes have separated from the sole of the shoe. Yes it has been a year and I teach aqua classes 5-6 days a week but normally these shoes hold up for ever.....I don't know what's going on with the quality. But a year should not qualify it to fall apart. That just makes no sense to me.
customer_reviews.author: marcy goldson

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: this Ryka shoe fits 1 size larger than other Ryka styles. I returned the first pair and have purchased 2 pair since! They run a full size larger! I normally wear a size 9 but this new style is size 8. I LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: T. Jane Schumann

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for water fitness.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run large so I bought a size down and they fit perfect. I do Aquafit five days a week and these shoes are great. I don’t fear slipping at poolside, on the steps or in the pool. They are so lightweight you don’t realize you have them on when you are in the pool. I would recommend these to any with a fear of falling around or in the pool. They are a great shoe alll around. My only wish is that they would dry faster for the next day.
customer_reviews.author: sharon donald

customer_reviews.title: They are a Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: They look very stylish... I got several compliments from the ladies in my water aerobics class. Easy to put on and take off. That is especially important when they are wet. I prefer Ryka brand because they are a good fit and great support and well made. Pool chlorine is brutal on shoes.. With this in mind, I think it is great that they last at least on year with my attending one hour classes three times a week. Rinse them out really well after each use... They will last better then if you do.
customer_reviews.author: Linnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Color and cushion inside
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the shoe nice pink color good cushion inside sole I ordered a size 6M the fit was one shoe size larger for me. So I'm going to order a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Sada

customer_reviews.title: Perfection. Buy a Pair and a Spare.
customer_reviews.text: Aqua Fit, Water Aerobic PERFECTION I actually hate that I have to save these just for class. I've contemplated wearing them for every day. A couple of months into water aerobics they have kept their color better than my chlorine safe swimsuit has!! *I have 2 pink and 2 black pairs. They actually are more comfortable than my Nike Epic running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoes for water aerobics class
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoes for water aerobics class! They do run very large however. I ordered my normal size 9 and it was way to big. went down to an 8 and my toes are right at end of shoe, but in the water they are great. Think a 8.5 might be a little loose in water, but not sure. If you are going to use the shoe much, out of water, ordering a half size smaller may be about right.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: These are the best pool shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pool shoes ever! The cushioning is perfect for high intensity interval training in the pool and when you get out the water drains right out of the shoes without having to take them off. Definitely order a half size smaller than your usual size and they’ll fit perfectly. Love these!!!!
customer_reviews.author: RandomGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Aerobics Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Best Ryka water shoes yet! I have worn the Swift and the Hydro. These have no padding but are still soft enough to wear without socks.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Best HydroShoes
customer_reviews.text: I use it for water aerobics and have received several complements even from my instructor she likes that it doesnot have the lace - its easy to get on to and fits like a glove - i had to go down a size but other than that i think i will even wear it on rainy days -
customer_reviews.author: Sajeev M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful shoes for water aerobics. They give my feet the support I wanted. Doing jumping jacks and the like barefoot on the concrete floor of the pool was hurting my knees, and these add the cushioning I was looking for. They look nice and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great for aqua fitness. Unlike water shoes, this hydro beaker provides adequate support and stability. The added plus is the convenient slip on style (which runs larger than the normal size). I wear a size 8 and had to go down an entire size. Nevertheless, I recommend this shoe and size down .5 to 1 size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Raleone

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG!
customer_reviews.text: I am a solid, true size 6, but after reading reviews indicating they ran big, I ordered a 5-1/2 and they're still at least a half size too big. If I go down to a 5, the price goes up from $28 to $65!!!!!! No way I'm spending that much. I'm returning them and going with the $20 Zhuanglin that actually fit IN my size.............
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Kay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe for water aerobics. Runs large, had to downsize to 8.5 from my regular size 9.
customer_reviews.author: kr

customer_reviews.title: I love that these are easy to put on and take ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are easy to put on and take off. I was able to run after kids in the swimming pool and my feet didn't slip at all--great traction. They have pretty good cushion and support also. I read the other reviews so that I knew if I normally wore an 8 1/2, to order an 8. Fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: E. H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy slip on. Mesh covering clings to your foot. Non slippery. Comfortable on my heels.
customer_reviews.author: Saint Vibiana

customer_reviews.title: Must order half size down but they run somewhat narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty shoe ( got the turquoise) and they feel great now that I know this brand rubs big.
customer_reviews.author: E. Constable

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I sized down a 1/2 size and I'm glad I ded. These fit great and have a nice arch support. Lightweight and the magenta is a gorgeous hot pink color! I have wide feet but with the upper webbing, it's not an issue:) I can't wait to wear them to the beach this summer vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Late night shopper

customer_reviews.title: These are not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.text: These are not comfortable at all. Gave me blisters all across the top of my toes where the plastic meets the material. Wore them twice and bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Just wore these for the first time for my aqua zumba class. I have had surgery on both of my feet and cannot comfortably do high impact... these were perfect for high impact water aerobics. My feet didn't hurt at all! The one thing I will say is that they run 1.5 sizes large. I normally wear a 10 in athletic sneakers, I had to order down to an 8.5...and they fit perfectly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for water aerobics.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! While they do run a little large, I still found them comfortable and give good support. I wish the soles were a bit more slip resistant - tend to be more slippery than I like on slick tiles in the pool. Overall, these are excellent shoes for my water aerobics classes.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Water Aerobics
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my water aerobics classes and love them! These are actually the 2nd pair I have owned. When my last pair finally wore out, I immediately looked to replace with the very same style!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I wear them to aqua aerobics and to walk in the pool since I suffered a foot injury. Great support and no pain waddling in them at all. I have already put them through the washer 4 times and they are still like brand new. I am going to order another pair just to wear this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is the third style of Ryka water shoes I have tried and they are the BEST. I teach aqua fitness and use them daily. Other styles wore out quickly but these are holding up. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: These run really large
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1/2 size smaller after reading the reviews...I should've bough 1.5 sizes smaller! They are very long-will exchange as they seem to be very supportive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that they would slip off in the pool but they have stayed happily on my foot. They are comfortable and easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoe
customer_reviews.text: I use these for water PT to support proper heel/toe walking on underwater treadmill. They dry quickly and have not molded or became smelly. I wear a 7.5 wide or 8 regularly depending on shoe styles. I got a 7.5 in these. While it is a bit narrow, it is not enough to be uncomfortable. They do not rub and the heel does not pull off. Overall I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: CalicoGirlP

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fit
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this shoe the look, fit works very well in or out of water. I totally agree with other reviews in that the shoe does run big I usually where a 8.5 I bought a 8 and it fits perfectly I would have been ruined with a bigger size since these are slip-on and my husband liked them before I put them on very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Cox

customer_reviews.title: Best pool shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, I am using for water aerobics. I wear 8m sandal, in this shoe I needed a 7.5m. I can tell this shoe will last.
customer_reviews.author: Nature Lover

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes, right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes, right out of the box, that I've ever owned. Purchased for the pool and gym. Decided I like them too much to get them wet all the time. Strictly gym shoes now.
customer_reviews.author: Julie from Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my water Aerobics class
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one size smaller and they fit perfectly. Love it for my water Aerobics class!!! They stay on my narrow feet!
customer_reviews.author: SAM52

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these - super comfortable. Also like that they come in half sizes.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Runs too big and guess what Prime members.... Amazon now charges to return!!! bye Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Comfy water shoes
customer_reviews.text: Oh so comfortable! I love the Ryka brand. All shoes I have ordered from them fit great, wear well, and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more for quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for water aerobics. Good support for jogging up and down the pool. I am a size 8 and purchased a size 7 which fits great. I’ve purchased cheaper water shoes that can’t hold a candle to these.
customer_reviews.author: Grams6

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ryka shoes are always comfortable and these work fine for walking in water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot pink shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are nice shoes. I read other reviews and did size down 1/2 size. They fit well. My only problem is not with the shoes, but rather, it is getting accoustomed to wearing shoes for water aerobics. Shoes do make it a bit heavier .
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Lavella

customer_reviews.title: Colorful Aqua shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the fact it is a slip on, which does not slip off in water. I do Aqua Aerobics 3-4 times a week and have used Ryka shoes for years. I tried this style as I got tired of my laces coming undone in the pool. The bright color is a bonus
customer_reviews.author: Catherine W. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: They feel great in the water
customer_reviews.text: The reviewers that said that you need to order a full size smaller than your regular shoe size proved to be correct. I doubted it, and originally ordered a half size smaller, which I decided to exchange because they were too large. For me, a full size smaller than my regular shoe size ended up fitting perfectly. They feel great in the water. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E.

customer_reviews.title: great water shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have been water walking and doing water aerobics for years now and I fortunately found the BEST shoe for my water classes so much support and Im not sore afterwords like I used to be in my legs
customer_reviews.author: mary vaci

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I wear them daily, for my hour long aqua fitness classes, and they've held up great!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear 9.5 but ordered a 9 based on reviews that these run large. I was worried they would feel too snug, but they are very very comfortable! I wore them for my water aerobics class and they were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness of the sole of the shoe and the stretchiness of the top. I need to wear arch supports and these shoes allow room and support for them. They are a little long even with the supports.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my RYKA Aqua shoes. They never disappoint and last for years
customer_reviews.author: Sabine C

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. I take water aerobics and these are petfect. I wear a size 12 and have a very hard time finding shoes that fit. This is my 2nd pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Hydro Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Hydro shoe is a comfortable, well fitting shoe. I wear the shoes for aquatic aerobic classes.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Aqua Zumba class
customer_reviews.text: Easy to slide on when heading into the pool. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet In The Villages

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and support for my aqua fit classes
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and support for my aqua fit classes. I sometimes wear a 9 1/2 , sometimes a 10 in my regular dry land footwear. The 9 1/2 watershoe was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Saucymeow

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a size smaller as recommended by the previous reviews and it is a perfect fit. I have very narrow feet and they fit li
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an aqua shoe that I didn’t have to lace and this fit the bill. I do wish there were other neutral colors other than black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, easy to get on/off
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easy to get on/off... no laces. Order half size down. I wear an 8 & 7.5 shoe fits just right while doing water aerobics. Stays snug on fit with all the jumping. May need different fit used for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a 9, my normal size and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 9, my normal size and it was too large. Exchanged for an 8 and I inserted an extra liner from a different pair of shoes and that fit was ok. I have not worn them except indoors so I don't know how they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Slip-On Petfection
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, water shoe drains well, slip-on no riding laces!
customer_reviews.author: F. Smith-Sykes

customer_reviews.title: It's light and was what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It is a light product. Worked very nice. I need to protect my feet in rocky river.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lovato

customer_reviews.title: Order shoes a half of a size smaller than your normal size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these swim shoes a half of a size smaller than I normally wear and they fit just perfectly, love these shoes !!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna H.

customer_reviews.title: Fit and style important to me.
customer_reviews.text: I will be using it for therapy exercises and swimmg in a pool.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Inman

customer_reviews.title: Great for water aerobics
customer_reviews.text: I took other reviews of this item into account when ordering (“order one size smaller as the shoes run big”) and my shoes fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Janice L. Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Easy slip on water shoes
customer_reviews.text: This water shoe slips on, no laces to come untied! I wear a size 10 in most shoes but when I tried to order a 10 the site suggested a 9. I wasn’t sure but followed the suggestion and the 9s are a perfect fit. They arrived the next day as promised.
customer_reviews.author: bemcmil

product_meta.title: Ryka Women's Hydrosphere Cross Trainer
product_meta.description: Stretch knit upper on our heritage water sport construction. Perforated Nitracel footbed and drainage ports in the midsole make this style perfect for a variety of water activities.
feature_bullets: Stretch knit upper with heel and vamp webbing pulls for easy on/off.
Compression molded EVA foam with drainage ports.
Highly flexible outsole design provides drainage ports and sticky rubber for better traction on wet surfaces.
